subject: RE: [junit] Re: Testing super-class contracts (test case reuse)
msgSnippet: ... If you are running tests by specifying **/*Test, then naming your abstract tests *Contract could be a simple way of doing that. Regards, Shaun.
messageBody:
> You may need to make sure your abstract test classes aren't
> found by ant.

If you are running tests by specifying **/*Test, then naming your
abstract tests *Contract could be a simple way of doing that.

Regards,
Shaun.
